meanings.definition: To make something sexual or arousing.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys eroticizing her stories to make them more exciting.
meanings.sent2: The artist was eroticizing the painting by adding sensual details.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked about eroticizing the dessert with a sprinkle of cinnamon.
meanings.sent4: His words had a way of eroticizing even the simplest of topics.
meanings.sent5: The movie director's skill in eroticizing scenes made the film unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To view or portray something in a sexual or sensual manner.
meanings.sent1: The photographer was eroticizing the model during the photoshoot.
meanings.sent2: Some advertisements have a way of eroticizing products to attract attention.
meanings.sent3: The comedian humorously talked about eroticizing everyday objects.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves had a way of eroticizing the music in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The author's talent lies in eroticizing even the most mundane settings in her novels.
